citRespParty.rpOrgName: Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

dataIdInfo.idPurp: The intended purpose of this dataset is to provide tabular data that represent hourly hydrographic measurements collected at specific locations.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Hydrographic hourly data may be downloaded by project, CRMS site, or by station number, but it should be noted that these files are much larger than the monthly files. For example, since one year of hourly sampling will yield approximately 8,760 records, a file for a project collecting data at 3 stations for a period of 5 years will contain approximately 131,400 records. For this reason, we recommend that hourly data be downloaded by station and not by project. The term “Raw” in the variable descriptions below indicates that data within that column are listed as reported by the data-collection instrument and have not been adjusted or corrected. The term “Adjusted” indicates that the raw data have been corrected for biofouling, instrument drift, and/or instrument malfunction.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: These data were created through a cooperative agreement between the Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA) and the U.S. Geological Survey, Wetland and Aquatic Research Center.

Consts.useLimit: Information that fulfills this data request has been carefully prepared from the best available sources of data. It is intended for general informational purposes only and should not be considered authoritative for navigational, engineering, other site-specific uses, or any other uses. The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA) does not warrant or guarantee its accuracy, nor does CPRA assume any responsibility or liability for any reliance thereon. Elevation measurements are dependent upon the choices of standards that were used, including: vertical datums, geoids, ellipsoids, and various other factors. These factors should be considered when comparing elevation data between stations.

dataExt.exDesc: Louisiana Coastal Zone. No end date, data updated continually.

idPoC.rpOrgName: Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

enttyp.enttypd: Tabular data that represent hydrographic measurements for specific locations.
enttyp.enttypds: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.
attr.attrdefs: Esri

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Alphanumeric value assigned to a station by CPRA used for identification purposes.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attrdomv.udom: Alphanumeric value assigned to a station by CPRA used for identification purposes (i.e., CRMS0292-H01).

attr.attrdef: Month, day, and year that the data were collected.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Time the data were collected.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Time zone in Central Standard Time (CST).
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Flotant Marsh, Surface Water, or Marsh Well.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attrdomv.udom: Flotant Marsh, Surface Water, Marsh Well.

attr.attrdef: Water temperature in degrees Celsius as reported by data recorder.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: “Raw Water Temperature” with erroneous data values removed.

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Specific conductance in microsiemens per centimeter as reported by the data recorder
“Raw Specific Conductance” corrected for biofouling and instrument drift, with erroneous data values removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Salinity in parts per thousand as calculated from “Raw Specific Conductance”.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Salinity in parts per thousand as calculated from “Adjusted Specific Conductance”, with erroneous data removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Water level as recorded in feet relative to the instrument sensor. This variable is not comparable through time at any given station nor is it comparable between or among other stations. Use “Adjusted Water Elevation to Datum” for water elevation comparisons.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Raw Water Level” corrected for biofouling and instrument drift, with erroneous data removed. This variable is not comparable through time at any given station nor is it comparable between or among other stations. Use “Adjusted Water Elevation to Datum” for water elevation comparisons.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Raw Water Elevation to Datum” shifted relative to average marsh elevation in the immediate vicinity of the data recorder.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Adjusted Water Elevation to Datum” shifted relative to average marsh elevation in the immediate vicinity of the data recorder. Used for evaluating marsh flooding.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Raw Water Level” converted to the North American Vertical Datum 1988 (NAVD88).
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Adjusted Water Level” converted to the North American Vertical Datum 1988 (NAVD88).
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Marsh Mat Elevation relative to North American Vertical Datum 1988 (NAVD 1988).
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attalias: Adjusted Marsh Mat Elevation to Datum (ft)
attr.attrdef: “Raw Marsh Mat Elevation” with erroneous data values removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Geoid model used to survey/calculate "Adjusted Water Elevation to Datum" (e.g., Geoid99, Geoid12A).
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Battery voltage as reported by the data recorder.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Raw Battery” with erroneous data values removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Wind speed in miles per hour as reported by anemometer.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Raw Wind Speed” with erroneous data values removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Wind direction in radian degrees as reported by anemometer.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Raw Wind Direction” with erroneous data values removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Water current velocity in feet per second as reported by the data recorder.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Raw Velocity” with erroneous data values removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Cumulative number of tips of “tipping bucket” type rain gauge.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Calculated precipitation in inches, with erroneous data values removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Air pressure in millimeters of mercury as reported by barometer.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: "Raw Air Pressure" with erroneous data values removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Total chlorophyll in micrograms per liter as recorded by the data recorder.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Raw Total Chlorophyll” in micrograms per liter with erroneous data values removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Dissolved oxygen in milligrams per liter.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Raw Dissolved Oxygen” in milligrams per liter with erroneous data values removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: pH in pH units.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Raw pH” with erroneous data values removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Turbidity in Formazin Nephelometric Turbidity Units.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Raw Turbidity” in Formazin Nephelometric Turbidity Units with erroneous data values removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Discharge in cubic feet per second.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: “Raw Discharge” in cubic feet per second, with erroneous data values removed.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Agency that collected the data.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attrdomv.udom: Agency that collected the data (i.e., COASTAL ESTUARY SERVICES LLC).

attr.attrdef: Additional comments regarding Continuous Hydrographic and DCP Data.

LegConsts.othConsts: It is strongly recommended that this data is directly acquired from the originator described above and or from another Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA) server and not indirectly through other sources which may have changed the data in some way. The originator makes no claims as to the data's suitability for other purposes.
